y_flags: Bruising easily, unusual bleeding from nose, mouth, rectum, or pinpoint red spots under your skin
y_means: Call your health care provider. These can be signs of internal bleeding
r_flags: Any bleeding that will not stop

g_flags: Have no bruising or bleeding-Note minor bleeding may be normal, e.g. small bruises, teeth that bleed a little bit during brushing or flossing.
y_flags: Coughing up blood that looks like coffee grounds
r_flags: Sudden onset headache, weakness, dizziness, feeling like you might pass out
r_means: You need to be evaluated by a health care professional immediately.

y_flags: Blood in urine or stools, black or tarry stools.
r_flags: Have severe back pain, numbness, muscle weakness in your lower body or loss of bladder or bowel control

y_flags: A cut that does not stop bleeding
Add, change, or stop any medicines.
